channel.title: [Need Developers] Starting a new rsps project
channel.description:
Hello everyone so i have been coding this client and server for quite a bit now, just rewriting everything because it was so horrid and now its finally playable and i need some EXPERIENCED and well taught coders. I need a good java coder to help because if i cant figure something out and want to give up i need someone who can help me figure out the issue. I also need a good website dev because my website creation skills are like basic.
Who i need: Website developer Java coder maybe 2
server info: 317 revision pk/eco/skilling (stuff to make good money for any path you choose)
Stuff i have added: doors 98% open and close (if u click the fuck out of them the clipping is a bit glitchy) Pk point system (2 per kill) fixed/changed stats for alot of items fixed/changed prices for alot of items added a bunch of npc's and shops etc. implemented lumby guide to explain server and give free pkp at end of tut click to change stats (for combat stats only) added skilling zones added barrows about 95% done added anims to make firecape moving! Added most specs some range weps might not have working specs added just all around stability and clean no bullshit code added working clanchat added flawless item switching
some media: http//prntscr.com/5uiibz http//prntscr.com/5uiisw (make sure to add the ':')
I also have alot of great ideas to add but im not about to post them haha yeah so if you wanna help out hmu pm or comment down below!

item.title: [Need Developers] Starting a new rsps project
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

Hello,

I can build your website if still needed. Feel free to add me on skype; RSPS.NET

Read full topic

item.title: [Need Developers] Starting a new rsps project
item.dc:creator: @BASEDFL BASEDFL
item.description:
@BASEDFL wrote:

i think i have what you need. message me and we will get in contact. i have java experience and my uncle and c++ and java degrees and hosts .com servers. i’d love to be a part of your team. also have helped on two of my friends servers.

Read full topic
